name: Ninja Ball
description:
Ninja Ball is a simple free arcade game and also a reflex game where you had to touch all platforms to win and go to next level.

40 levels increasing the difficult every time make this arcade game a real Challenge!

Incredible physics very close to a real Ninja Ball reflex.

Cool graphics and design with a retro effect !

Accept this Ninja ball challenge ! can you finish all this game levels of this reflex game !

Ninja Ball is one of the best arcade game and reflex

You will enter in a universe with nice music and a retro effect !

And with this riddle after some updates it will be available new balls,new levels,you will be able to send me your levels and maybe an online mode !

Contact me for any problem with Ninja Ball reflex
